product_name: Sunday Afternoons Natalie Hat - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Woven of ribbon and lace in a delighfully fresh style, the women's Natalie Hat from Sunday Afternoons offers a flexible brim for your own custom look and superb sun protection. Made of 70% polyester and 30% paper. UPF 50+ rating and wide 5.25 in. moldable wire brim protect you from the sun. Packs flat for travel. Sunday Afternoons Natalie Hat is adorned with a ribbon rose and adjustable ribbon tie. Closeout.
short_description: Woven of ribbon and lace in a delighfully fresh style, the women's Natalie Hat from Sunday Afternoons offers a flexible brim for your own custom look and superb sun protection.
